author: Ed Crocker
description:
This Gilded Abyss by Rebecca Thorne—book one of a trilogy which began life as a self-pub a couple of years ago but was subsequently picked up and recently released by Tor—felt like an all-you-can-eat-buffet without the food poisoning. The original pitch upon announcement was “lesbians versus zombies on a doomed submarine,” which should give you […]

The post REVIEW: This Gilded Abyss by Rebecca Thorne appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: This Gilded Abyss by Rebecca Thorne
